#S(12)#C(#FFFF00)玩法说明：#n#H#S(12)#C(#00FF00)1.佣兵任务需邀请好友组队后接取，也可使用随缘组队快速组队。#H2.每天前10次任务可获得经验和金币奖励，10次之后单次任务无任何奖励。#H3.每完成10次任务可获得一次目标奖励。#H4.每完成10次任务可进行一次佣兵摇奖，每日最多可获得3次佣兵奖金。#H5.每周佣兵任务最多可进行300次。#H6.每周一0:00重置佣兵任务次数和完成情况。#n	#S(12)#C(#FFFF00)Event Introduction: #n#H#S(12)#C(#00FF00)1. Mercenary Quest should be accepted after you team up with friends. You can also use quickly team up. #H2. You can get EXP and Gold the first 10 times you complete the quest. You won't receive rewards afterwards. #H3. You can receive the target reward once you complete the quest 10 times. #H4. You can participate in Lucky Draw of Mercenary once you complete the quest 10 times. You can obtain a Mercenary Bonus 3 times max. #H5. You can complete Mercenary Quests up to 300 times every week. #H6. Attempts and performance will be reset at 00:00 every Monday. #n	0

#S(12)奖励：#C(#FF8000)声望、积分、主角属性#n#H#S(12)玩法说明：#H1.随机匹配挑战不同难度的对手#H2.对手根据难度划分为：普通级、精英级、地狱级、噩梦级，战胜对手分别可获得8/12/16/20点积分#H3.挑战失败则固定获得4点积分，积分可用于兑换宝箱获得声望和魔晶#H4.每天只能兑换一种宝箱，兑换时需谨慎#H4.每次挑战可获得固定5点声望，与对手等级及胜败无关#H5.完成试炼成就可永久增加主角属性#n	#S(12)Reward:#C(#FF8000)Prestige, points, Character Stats #n#H#S(12) Event Description:#H1. Match randomly to challenge players of different difficulties. #H2. The difficulties are: Easy, Normal, Hard and Nightmare. Defeating rivals will give you 8, 12, 16 or 20 points depending on the difficulty. #H3. If you fail the challenge you will receive 4 points. The points can be used to exchange for Chests and obtain Prestige and Bound Balens.#H4. You can only exchange one kind of Chest every day. #H4. Every challenge will guive you 5 Prestige no matter the level of the rival and the result of the challenge. #H5. Receive the trial achievement to boost the Stats of your Character permanently. #n	0

You can explore once every day. #H2. If you find a monster and defeat it, you can click on it to receive Bound Balens. #H3. If you defeat a monster but you’re offline, the corresponding Bounty List Avatar won’t be lighten up. #H4. You need to defeat the monsters before you can start the next exploration. #H5. You can help your friends to defeat monsters and lighten the Avatar to exchange Bounty. #H6. Every Monster Avatar can only be lightened once. The Bounty List will be reset every 2 days. Remember to exchange your Bounty as soon as possible. #n	0

1-5星召唤令	Lvl 1-5 Summoning Token	0
1.活动期间每日充值达到3000神石可领取固定奖励。#H2.充值达到3000神石的玩家有资格进入充值排行榜，跨服排行榜每半个小时更新一次，本服排行榜实时更新。#H3.每日23：58结算当日玩家充值排名。#H4.每日00：00以邮件方式发放排行奖励，跨服前500名、本服前10名的玩家可获得丰厚奖励。#H5.玩家可通过下方按钮查看跨服和本服的今日排名和昨日排名。	1. During the event, recharge 3000 Balens every day to claim rewards. #H2. The players who recharge 3000 Balens will be in the Recharge Rankings. The Cross-server Rankings will be refreshed every 30 minutes. And the data of the Rankings in this server will be updated in real-time. #H3. The Recharge Ranking will be settled every day at 23:58. #H4. The rewards will be sent by mail every day at midnight. Top 500 players in the Cross-server Recharge Rankings and Top 10 players in this server’s Recharge Rankings will receive awesome rewards. #H5. Players can click the icon below to check this server’s Rankings and Cross-server’s rankings of today and the day before.	0
1.活动期间每日消费达到2400充值神石可领取固定奖励。#H2.消费达到2400充值神石的玩家有资格进入消费充值神石排行榜，跨服排行榜每半个小时更新一次，本服排行榜实时更新。#H3.每日23：58结算当日玩家消费充值神石排名。#H4.每日00：00以邮件方式发放排行奖励，跨服前500名、本服前10名的玩家可获得丰厚奖励。#H5.玩家可通过下方按钮查看跨服和本服的今日排名和昨日排名。	1. During the event, consume 2400 Recharge Balens every day to claim rewards. #H2. The players who consume 2400 Recharge Balens will be in the Consume Rankings. The Cross-server Rankings will be refreshed every 30 minutes and the Rankings data in this server will be updated in real-time. #H3. The Consume Ranking will be cleared every day at 23:58. #H4. The rewards will be sent by mail every day at midnight. The Top 500 players in the Cross-server Consume Rankings and Top 10 players in this server’s Consume Rankings will receive awesome rewards. #H5. Players can click the icon below to check this server’s Rankings and Cross-server’s rankings of today and the day before.	0

1、#C(#00FF00)世界等级＜80且服务器开服时间≤30天时，荣耀之战每日定时开启；#H 世界等级≥80且服务器开服时间>30天时，每周二、周五的荣耀之战将替换为跨服圣域争霸#n#H2、击败的玩家战斗力越高可获得的积分也越高#H3、连续击杀玩家还会有特别加成#H4、获得的积分越高奖励也会越高#H5、积分排名前10还会获得特别奖励#H6、战胜BOSS也会获得特别积分奖励#H7、击杀BOSS后，同阵营玩家攻击该BOSS，可以获得增伤及免伤的加成#H8、梦想与荣耀同在，夺积分，获声望，金币，装备材料	1. Players can get points through attacking members of other groups. #H2. The higher your Battle Rating is, the more points you will receive. #H3. Killing streaks will be rewarded with a bonus. #H4. The more points you receive, the better the rewards you will obtain. #H5. The Top 10 players in the points rankings will also receive special rewards. #H6. Players can also receive points as a reward for defeating a Boss. #H7. When a player defeats a Boss, the rest of the players from the same group will get a damage boost and reduce the damage received when attacking the same Boss. #H8. Obtain points to exchange them for Prestige, Gold and Equipment Materials.	0
1、#C(#00FF00)世界等级＜80且服务器开服时间≤30天时，荣耀之战每日定时开启；世界等级≥80且服务器开服时间>30天时，每周二、周五的荣耀之战将替换为跨服圣域争霸#n#H2、击败的玩家战斗力越高可获得的积分也越高#H3、连续击杀玩家还会有特别加成#H4、获得的积分越高奖励也会越高#H5、积分排名前10还会获得特别奖励#H6、战胜BOSS也会获得特别积分奖励#H7、击杀BOSS后，同阵营玩家攻击该BOSS，可以获得增伤及免伤的加成#H8、梦想与荣耀同在，夺积分，获声望，金币，装备材料	1. Players can get points through attacking members of other groups. #H2. The higher your Battle Rating is, the more points you will receive. #H3. Killing streaks will be rewarded with a bonus. #H4. The more points you receive, the better the rewards you will obtain. #H5. The Top 10 players in the points rankings will also receive special rewards. #H6. Players can also receive points as a reward for defeating a Boss. #H7. When a player defeats a Boss, the rest of the players from the same group will get a damage boost and reduce the damage received when attacking the same Boss. #H8. Obtain points to exchange them for Prestige, Gold and Equipment Materials.	0
1、#C(#00FF00)每周一、三、五、日开启活动#n#H2、公会奖励：最终伤害排名前三的玩家可以给本公会所有参与魔兽入侵的玩家带来公会奖励。#H3、击杀奖励：活动结束后，将会根据玩家在本次活动中总共击杀的魔兽数量发放击杀奖励。#H4、击败魔兽，保卫家园，可获得大量金币和经验果奖励	1. #C(#00FF00)The event is scheduled for every Monday, Wednesday and Friday. #n#H2. Guild Rewards: Guild members of the top 3 players who dealt the most damage in Invaders! will be rewarded. #H3. Execution Rewards: After the event is over, the rewards will be sent to players according to the number of monsters they have killed. #H4. Defeat monsters to receive a lot of Gold and EXP Fruits.	0
1、#C(#00FF00)每周二、四、六开启活动#n#H2、公会奖励：最终伤害排名前三的玩家可以给本公会所有参与魔龙降临的玩家带来公会奖励。#H3、击杀奖励：活动结束后，将会根据玩家在本次活动中总共造成的伤害发放奖励。#H4、根据对魔龙造成伤害排名可以获得排名奖励。	1. #C(#00FF00)The event is scheduled for every Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday. #n#H2. Guild Rewards: Guild members of the top 3 players who dealt the most damage in Evil Dragon will be rewarded. #H3. Execution Rewards: After the event, the rewards will be sent to players according to the total damage they have dealt. #H4. Players on the Damage Rankings will also receive Ranking Rewards.	0

1、公会奖励：最终伤害排名前三的玩家可以给本公会所有参与魔兽入侵的玩家带来公会奖励。#H2、击杀奖励：活动结束后，将会根据玩家在本次活动中总共击杀的魔兽数量发放击杀奖励。#H3、击败魔兽，保卫家园，可获得大量金币和经验果奖励。#H4、每天只能参加1场活动，并从中获取奖励。	1. Rewards: After the event, the rewards will be sent to players according to the number of monsters they have killed. #H3. Defeat monsters to receive a lot of Gold and EXP Fruits. #H4. 1、守方为1个公会，攻方最多7个公会；#H2、守方胜利条件：活动结束时，雕像未被完全摧毁；#H3、攻方胜利条件：活动结束前，摧毁所有雕像；#H4、守方胜利，守方获得第一档奖励，攻方公会积分前三名获得其他奖励，且下次活动守方不变；#H5、攻方胜利，攻方公会综合积分前三名获得前三档奖励，守方获得第四档奖励，且攻方第一名公会为下场活动守方；#H6、守方连续守城时，攻方将获得破连守BUFF，连守天数越多，BUFF效果越强；#H7、城主我来做，赢得大量金币、经验和装备材料。	1. There can be one defending Guild and up to seven attacking Guilds a the same time.#H2. If the statues are not destroyed by the end of the battle, the defending Guild wins. #H3. If the statues get destroyed by the end of the battle, the attacking Guilds win. #H4. If the defending Guild wins, it will receive the best reward and the chance to be a defending Guild the next time. The better 3 attacking Guilds will also receive rewards. #H5. If the attacking Guilds win, the Top 3 Guilds will receive the best three rewards and the defending Guild will receive the forth. When the attacking Guilds win, the better one will become the defending Guild in the next battle. #H6. If a Guild achieves to hold back the attack for two or more days in a row, the attacking Guilds will receive a BUFF. The more days the defending Guild endures the attack, the stronger the BUFF will be. #H7. Become the defending Guild, and win a lot of Gold, EXP and synthesizing materials.	0
1、守方为1个公会，攻方最多7个公会；#H2、守方胜利条件：活动结束时，雕像未被完全摧毁；#H3、攻方胜利条件：活动结束前，摧毁所有雕像；#H4、守方胜利，守方获得第一档奖励，攻方公会积分前三名获得其他奖励，且下次活动守方不变；#H5、攻方胜利，攻方公会综合积分前三名获得前三档奖励，守方获得第四档奖励，且攻方第一名公会为下场活动守方；#H6、守方连续守城时，攻方将获得破连守BUFF，连守天数越多，BUFF效果越强；#H7、退出公会24小时内，无法参加城主轮值#H8、城主我来做，赢得大量金币、经验和装备材料	1. There can be only one defending guild and seven attacking guilds max..#H2. If the statues are not being destroyed completely by the end of the battle, the defending guild wins. #H3. If the statues get destroyed completely by the end of the battle, then the attacking guilds win. #H4. If the defending guild wins, it will receive the best reward and the following Top 3 attacking guilds will receive the rest of the rewards. Moreover, the defending guild will get the chance to keep being the defending guild again in the next battle. #H5. If the attacking guilds win, the Top 3 Guilds will receive the best three rewards and the forth one will go to the defending guild. When the attacking guilds win, the one that's No. 1 will become the defending team in the next battle. #H6. If one guild manages to stand against the attack for two or more days in a row, the attacking guilds will receive a BUFF. The more days the defending guild stays on position, the stronger the BUFF will be. #H7. Within 24 hours after you leave a Guild, you can't join any Guild Battles. #H8. Be the defending guild and win lots of Gold, EXP and synthesizing materials.	0

There are one defending guild and seven attacking guilds max.#H2. If the statues are not destroyed completely by the end of the battle, the defending guild wins. #H3. If the statues get destroyed completely by the end of the battle, then the attacking guilds win. #H4. If the defending guild wins, it will receive the best reward and the following Top 3 attacking guilds will receive the rest of the rewards. Moreover, the defending guild will get the chance to keep being the defending guilg again in the next battle. #H5. If the attacking guilds win, the Top 3 Guilds will receive the best three rewards and forth one will go to the defending guild. When the attacking guilds win, the No 1 will become the defending team in the next battle. #H6. If one guild successfully holds back the attack for two or more days in a row, the attacking guilds will receive a BUFF. The more days the defending guild holds in a row, the stronger the BUFF will be. #H7. The number of the guilds taking part in Guild Battle will be adjusted accordingly after the server merge: #H From the third merged server on, with every one server merged, the number of guilds allowed to take part in the Guild Battle of that server will increase by one. #H The number of the participating guilds will stop increasing increase once the number of merged servers has exceeded 20.	0

If the defending guild wins, it will receive the best reward and the following Top 3 attacking guilds will receive the rest of the rewards. 1、当天充值达到一定额度时，可获得1次奖励，奖励可重复领取。#H2、每日0点清空当天充值数据。	1. You can claim one reward after recharging a certain amount in one day. The reward can be claimed repeatedly.#H 2. The daily recharge data is reset every day at midnight.	1
1、折扣商城分为：道具商城和贵族商城；道具商城可用充值神石和奖励神石购买，贵族商城只能用充值神石购买。#H2、商城的商品分开结算；总价达到一定额度就能享受相应的折扣。#H注：活动期间购买商品满500打95折、满1000打9折、满2000打85折、满5000打8折、满10000打75折、满20000打7折、满50000打65折、满100000打6折。	1. The discount shops are divided to the Item Shop and the VIP Section. Purchases in the Item Shop are paid by Recharge Balens and Reward Balens whereas the VIP section takes Recharge Balens only.#H 2. The payments in the shop are handled separately. After a certain total amount is reached, you become entitled to a discount.#H Note: Purchases during the events earn you the following discounts: after reaching the amount of 500 - the 5% discount; after reaching the amount of 1000 - 10%; 2000 - 15%; 5000 - 20%; 10000 - 25%; 20000 - 30%; 50000 - 35%; and finally, spending 100000 gives you the 40% discount.	1
1、每天累积充值200神石即可领取当日奖励；#H2、每日充值后可花费200充值神石购买超值物品，每次仅限1次。#H3、累计完成天数还可领取额外奖励。	1. Recharge 200 Balens every day to receive daily rewards. #H2. After recharging, you can every day buy goods at an attractive price by spending 200 Recharge Balens, but only once a day.#H 3. Accumulate days of recharge to receive extra rewards.	1
1、每天累积充值满200神石即可完成一天充值目标。#H2、活动期间按照完成充值目标的天数领取奖励。#H3、完成7天目标可以领取超级大奖。	1. Recharge 200 Balens in one day to reach the goal.#H 2. During the event, you can claim rewards for reaching the recharging goals for several days.#H 3. You will receive lots of rewards when you reach the 7-day goal.	1
1、活动期间每日会出售不同的商品，每个商品仅限充值神石购买，每个商品只能购买一次。#H2、每日0点结算时根据实际购买人数进行神石奖励，返还货币为奖励神石。#H3、每个商品购买的前20名玩家可获得额外的奖励，奖励会在每日0点结算时发放。	1. During the event, different goods are offered for purchase each day. They can be bought only for Recharge Balens and only once.#H 2. Balens are awarded every day at midnight according to the actual number of buyers. The reward is credited in Reward Balens.#H 3. The first 20 players who bought the item get an additional reward which is issued daily at midnight.	1
1、活动期间每消耗10充值神石即可获得1消费积分，兑换道具需消耗消费积分，消费积分在活动期间不清零；#H2、活动结束后积分将被清零，请及时兑换。	1. During the event, players earn 1 Recharge Point for every 10 Recharge Balens spent. Exchanging items consumes Recharge Points; your points won’t be reset during the event. #H2. They will be reset after the event is over so please don’t forget to exchange them in time.	1
1、活动期间，可消耗1个道具“幸运红包”即可向世界频道或公会频道发放红包。#H2、发放红的玩家可决定发放红包的祝福语、数量和频道。#H3、玩家可通过频道广播链接跳转到抢红包界面进行抢红包。#H4、每个玩家每日可领取30个红包。	1. During the event, spending one Gift of Luck allows you to send a gift over the world channel or the common channel.#H 2. The gift-giver can write a congratulatory text to accompany the gift, set the number of gifts and select the channel to use.#H 3. The player can grab their gift by clicking the link to the gift claim interface.#H 4. A player can get up to 30 gifts daily.	1
1、活动期间，可消耗道具和充值神石兑换珍贵道具。	1. During the event, you can spend an item and Recharge Balens to exchange them for a rare item.	1
1、活动期间，每天在线2小时即可获得2次翻牌机会。#H2、消耗翻牌机会可随机获得一次奖励，共14个奖励，活动7天只要满足在线条件即可全部领取。	1. During the event, stay online for 2 hours twice a day to get 2 chances to participate in the lottery.#H 2. Spending one chance allows you to get a reward once. There are 14 rewards in total. You can get all of them during the 7 days of the event just by staying online for the requisite amounts of time.	1
